name: The name of the Skill.
image: The featured image for the Skill; the Skill's in-game icon.
release: Array representing the month and year for the release date of the update that added the Skill to the game.
update: The release message for the update that added the Skill to the game.
aka: The alternate name for the Skill.
members: A yes or no value indicating if the content can only be accessed in the game with a paid subscription.
type: A string representing the 'type' of this Skill. Possible values include 'Combat', 'Gathering', 'Production' and 'Utility'.
